about_the_game:
Hidden Cats of Shanghai

Embark on a journey through vibrant Shanghai, searching for playful cats hidden in the Bund, traditional lane houses (longtang), and bustling night markets. Can you find them all?

Game Features:
• Over 100 unique cats waiting to be discovered
• Beautiful AI-generated Shanghai scenes, from the Huangpu River to classic Shikumen architecture
• Relaxing soundtrack inspired by Jiangnan traditional music
• Perfect for short breaks - find a few cats, save your progress, and return anytime

Take a break from daily life with this casual hidden object game. Each cat has its own personality and hiding style, making every discovery a delightful surprise.

name: Hidden Cats of Shanghai

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-3470 或 AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 或 AMD Radeon HD 7870
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
